critique: The document aims to promote efficiency and stability in federal construction projects through project labor agreements. The primary emotion the President wants to elicit is a sense of joy that the projects are completed on time and on budget. There is also an element of surprise that the projects are completed so efficiently. There is a sense of fear that the projects will not be completed on time and on budget if the project labor agreements are not used. There is a sense of disgust that the projects have not been completed on time and on budget in the past. There is a sense of sadness that the projects have not been completed on time and on budget in the past. There is no sense of anger.
